scripts.build:react/core: chokidar "../package/react/core/src/**/*" "../package/react/core/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 300 -c "npm --prefix ../package/react/core run build && echo '✅ [react/core] build successfully'"
scripts.build:react/utils: chokidar "../package/react/utils/src/**/*" "../package/react/utils/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 300 -c "npm --prefix ../package/react/utils run build && echo '✅ [react/utils] build successfully'"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -n playground,react/core,react/utils -c green,cyan,magenta "npm run dev" "npm run build:react/core" "npm run build:react/utils"
